modName: Laylette - Nord Preset for ECE and RaceMenu
descriptionHtml:
[center]My Nord preset for ECE and RaceMenu.[/center][center][u]
Backstory
[/u][i]Laylette was born into the guild known as the Companions, as the secret child of Skjor and Aela. Not wanting anybody to know about the affair, they sent Laylette away to live with a trusted pack of werewolves known as the Dale. Growing up, Laylette didn't remember her parents, but still led a happy life. One seemingly peaceful night, Laylette was by the campfire with her brothers and sisters. Then came the pounding of hooves, piercing the silence. They all leapt to their feet as the stampede of angry men grew closer. Laylette caught a glint of a silver sword. It was the Silver Hand. She wanted to stay and fight with her family, but her foster mother told her to flee. Leaving the young Laylette with no choice but to run, she left for Whiterun, where she'd heard the Companions were staying. They accepted her in as a true warrior, a shield sister, although Laylette would never tell them how she fled from battle that one unforgettable night. With a huge secret weighing her down, yet rage and guilt still filling her heart she seeks to finally destroy the Silver Hand for what they did.

[/i]Installation for RaceMenu:
Extract the 'laylettepreset' files into Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen.
Then extract 'laylettepreset.jslot' to Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets.
Open up the racemenu with the console command 'showracemenu'.
Select the Nord race.
Go into the presets tab and select 'laylettepreset'.
Go to the sculpt tab and press import head, then select 'laylettepreset'.

Installation for ECE
Extract '_11_commonTriraces.jslot' to Documents/My Games/Skyrim/CME_Save.
Open up the racemenu with the console command 'showracemenu'.
Select the Nord Race.
Go into the body tab and select slot load.
Load slot 11.[i]
[/i]
Mods required:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdo's[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?]Showracemenu Precache Killer[/url]

Mods recommended:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body (NSFW)[/url]

Mods used in screenshots:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68950/?]Ciri Armor[/url]

Enjoy :)

[/size][/center]
